title: Retro, future marine-type font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215220im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img074_4669.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215220im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2w24tnl_5124.gif)
  
I'm looking for this font which was a font recently used for an album released by a Korean girl group called Girls' Generation. I've found a similar font family with the name "To Be Continued" but the pictures & that font don't seem to match up quite exactly.~~

P.S. ughh.. didnt know how to move a forum since I posted this in the wrong one. :/  
anyways I'm new here and I think this place is a great way to learn about different fonts & discover new ones. :))  
ooh..& sorry about the big pic size, dont know how to resize..EEk!!
author: walkingxdownstairs

comments.content: Looks like the original series Star Trek font to me. Bitstream has a version called [Horizon](http://web.archive.org/web/20100629215220/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/horizon/) but you could probably find something free at a fan site.

woww..thanks soo much!!  
you guys really are fast!!
